greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Total sum of bases and exponents in Quetian Superfactorization of n, excluding the unity-exponents at the tips of branches.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
A. Karttunen, Scheme-program for computing this sequence.
mathematica: a[1] = 0; a[n_] := a[n] = #[[1]] + a[#[[2]]]& /@ FactorInteger[n] // Total; Array[a, 100] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 03 2016 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 09 2005 based on _Leroy Quet_'s message ('Super-Factoring' An Integer) posted to SeqFan-mailing list on Dec 06 2003.
